ns:common.document.text: In programming, Visual Assembler is an integrated development environment for assembly language programs that incorporates rapid application development features. Direct support is provided for win32 assembly programming on x86 processors, using the MASM, NASM, or TASM assembler.\nMost assemblers are still text based, however Visual Assembler has its own Graphical user interface (GUI). There was also a built-in debugger
